description.value: Care codes are high-level codes used to identify types and categories of care for use in encounters, episodes, and care categories throughout Antenatal care guideline computable content.

definition.value: An episode of antenatal care related to a single pregnancy
An initial or planned contact occurring as part of antenatal care
The condition of pregnancy, suspected or confirmed
Iron supplement prescribed as part of antenatal care
Folic acid supplement prescribed as part of antenatal care
